page.title: 01S.Washington,Tyne & Wear.
page.content: Our survey area in{Washington,Tyne {and Wear}includes 4 or 5 villages and two industrial estates.The block is split by the{A1 Motorway}and other highways which are surrounded by several{new housing estates.}Some houses are private and are in a varying price range,others are owned by the Council.Housing development is increasing.There are large wooded areas on the banks of the{River Wear. As this was once a{mining area}there are the remains of pits and old colliery railway lines. Policy has been to provide all villages with their own facilities for {leisure,education and shopping,}while transport to the town centre is also provided. In the southern section is{Lambton {Park and Castle.
